document.full_text: the north american branch of the christian brothers, a roman catholic order that runs schools around the world, has filed for bankruptcy protection amid mounting sexual abuse claims against u.s. and canadian members.
document.title: catholic christian brothers order files for bankruptcy
lines_and_colors: the north american branch of the christian brothers, a roman catholic order that runs schools around the world, has filed for bankruptcy protection amid mounting sexual abuse claims against u.s. and canadian members.
